title: I love the simple interface
comment: But it would be handy to have "Delete" comics function in the app with support for deleting comics inside SD card. Also a "Zoom Pinch" function is much needed. I'm okay with occasional crashes.

title: It's nice
comment: Can't zoom (need to use settings) and everytime I go to the end of a page it goes to the next page... Please fix it I'll rate it 5 when its fixed

title: Big issues
comment: Can't zoom in/out when reading,pages are not centered.can't go to next page and sometimes it gets stuck in the middle of both pages.

title: Kajsjs
comment: Shehe

title: Almost there
comment: Buggy page turning, no pinch zooming. However, what is making me start looking for other is that it was reading the contents in the wrong order for this last book.

title: Very nice
comment: This is the best one I've tried so far.  The only issue is that the screen sometimes flickers as you scroll or turn pages.  I can live with that.
Best comic reader i've used, doesn't crash randomly and doesn't stop showing pages randomly like other ones.

title: Unable to access external memory
comment: Unable to access external memory
Would not load past first image
Loading of next page is a bit funny otherwise fine
nice app
Awesome app, easily used.. Would recommend it to everyone

title: Crashfest
comment: Installed. Crashed twice. Uninstalled

title: Lacks multi touch zoom
comment: Some comic panels require zooming in. Kindly add that feature.

title: Amazing but needs fixing
comment: The app is amazing but after the last update, the app don't open comics anymore and closes itself. It's annoying really!!

title: Good app
comment: I really like it. Nice,  Clean simple.  The no pinch To zoom is a deal breaker for me though.  Perhaps in a future update? I'll try a few more apps .  Maybe give this one another look at a later time..

title: Best app to read comics
comment: Try it.
I love this app I am able to search my files to find any comic book I have and read it

title: Could be better, Need some work
comment: Would be pretty all right if there was a proper "pinch to zoom" ability, and the page turning wasn't so buggy. Also, the app seems to get attached to particular pages of a comic, and always want to resume to the same spot, even if you were much further along when you last closed the app.

title: Cool
comment: Super fun and they have the best comics

title: Zoom
comment: Was not able to zoom in on a frame

title: Cool
comment: This application is awsome!

title: Came back to this after trying ComicRack
comment: I actually tried Comic Rack (Paid version) and didn't like it, so I went back to this one. This reader has a simple interface. ComicRack's interface actually made it hard to read and enjoy a comic. Every time I tried to go to the next page, it zooms in. Although Comics Reader doesn't have a zoom function (minus 1 star), it's fine with me. I just switched from my 7" tablet to my 10" tablet. I may try out Challenger Comics Viewer and see if it's better.

title: Great
comment: Almost perfect. Only one issue. Doesn't work in landscape mode. Glitches and the screen pops to black on and off. Otherwise amazing app.

title: It works
comment: Awesome
Option to zoom please

title: I get lost
comment: I get los in comics, the app is staedy, trusfull, i dont know the best, but this is a contender
Easy, fast, readable!

title: Most frustrating
comment: App does not work well at all. Doesnt find your comic files but makes you find them and sometimes doesn't even show them at all. When trying to flip a page sometimes it will flip to the same page your on a dozen times or so, fix for this is exit the app, reload it, find the comic, find the page and hope it doesn't happen again. It oftentimes will. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.

title: Clean, but missing important features
comment: Overall I like the clean UI but it is missing some important features like zooming and some basic library functionality. I'd like to set a default location for my comic files and a way to mark comic books as (un)read.

title: Best
comment: I like this app super

title: Gets the job done, but nothing fancy
comment: No zoom is a bit frustrating. When I create a bookmark and then later try to use the bookmark to go back to where I was, it crashes. If I go to a different app and then later go back to this one, it starts from the beginning like I opened the file for the first time. Might need to look for a better comic reader... Just found Challenger Comics Viewer....much better. Truth.
Can't zoom

title: Has potential
comment: Touch sensitivity is awful,  lack of options,  no zoom.

title: Sux
comment: Uninstalled

title: Can't zoom
comment: Why can't you zoom in, some text can hardly be seen and its worse on a duble page. It's the only problem I have come across but its kinda a biggie As it means having to read those pages on another comic reader that can zoom but crashes every other page.

title: It works.
comment: Didn't care for it all that much though. Wasnt very touch sensitive. Had to try 2 or 3 times to get it to respond. Note 2.

title: Not working
comment: When I select the comic the screen goes right back to my book list.

title: Great app
comment: Doesn't mess around, just does what it should, no problems.
Worth it if comic lover
It ain't great.. Needs a zoom feature.. Will help
Good app. Would like pinch and zoom though

title: Awesome app!
comment: Overall pretty good app. Has alot of awesome settings. Would love to see double tap and pinch to zoom features and some improvements on the UI: like a book self and a recently books read list etc. But even now i believe its better from the most paid readers and all of the free ones!! Will give it 5 if some of the features i mention going to be added later on :)

title: Good App!
comment: Overall a good app. Nice compatibility with different book file types. User interface could be a bit better. Reminds a little of the older days with dos but it works. I can read my DeadPool Comics and D&D books. Keep it up!
Add zoom..

title: Comics reader
comment: Works. Thanks! Pinch for zoom and support for pdf files would be very nice to add.
No ads,  smooth,  works great!

title: What the..!?!
comment: Cannot browse to the file location... It opens up from the very beginning then I try to browse the sd card but it doesn't show the folder not the folder holding the comics... Do fix please...

title: Works Nexus 7

title: 5 stars

title: One of the best!!!
comment: Certainly, given its small size and ease of use i must say its one of the most bestest apps out there and i will surely give it a five star rating if u add a pinch zoom feature in it! Thanx!
The new update made some of my front covers become the last page instead in most of my comics.
Please could you tell me what are the names of your files inside the CBZ/CBR (eventually by email to kervala@gmail.com) ? Thanks, I suspect it's related with natural order sorting.
Excellent

comment: Opened it up, was confronted with a bunch of my file folders, none of which contained the file I needed opened. If I have to work for it, I'm going elsewhere.

title: No zoom
comment: No zoom.

title: Great reader
comment: This really is a good reader. I've tried 3 other readers and had issues with them, mainly not supporting the .cbr format. Also this one works smoothest, auto rotate works great.   The only thing I miss is the bookmarking... that is remembering where I left reading the comic last time. The bookmarking that is implemented I don't understand, coz it looks like bookmarking URLs (!?).
Only problem I'm having is zooming

title: Don't download
comment: It the worst
I go storage/emulated/0/ and look for the downloads folder only to find its not there.  What's up with that? My file manager finds it just fine.  Useless app for me.

title: Simple, yet good.
comment: Nice, simple comic reader, but it really needs the zoom feature.

title: I like it
comment: A little buggy.  But good

title: Great little app
comment: As others have mentioned it could do with a pinch zoom feature. And occasionally it backs right out of my comics folder when exiting a comic (minor gripe) But the ONE thing it could do with, is a proper screen icon, the default android icon is awful. But it's free and it works.

title: It's ok does not zoom
comment: It's ok does not zoom on my galaxy S 4 makes it really hard to read need a magnifying glass to read comic , make it zoom and I will give it 4 stars...
Is Chromecast possible?

title: Crashed
comment: Every time I open my download directory it crashes. Cyanogen 10 stable.  Still, 3 stars for gplv3 and minimal permissions. Thank you!

title: My wish for this great app
comment: I hope you can put a system wich tells you that you have already read the file pls pls add this so i can keep track on what i already have read :)

comment: I love this app it is the ladder to comics

comment: Just a good file reader plain 'n simple. No bells and whistles or annoying ads.

title: Best of all the readers.

title: Looks and works really good.

title: Excellent

Just what i wanted XD thankss

title: No pinch to zoom?
comment: Am unable to zoom into the page. When I try to expand throgh touch gesture no response. Also can't seem to find a button or menu option to increase zoom factor.

title: Works well
comment: Cant complain about this comic reader. Works very well and have had no errors. Great job! Its always the simple apps that seem to work the best. Just a couple suggestions. For internally stored comics, it would be nice to continue scrolling when done with one comic right into the next one if the are stored in the same folder. It would also be nice to have the app save where you left off or at least be able to bookmark that spot.

title: Right on!
comment: Works great for my .cbr the walkung dead files

title: Nice!
comment: No lag! No slowdowns! And all images load so fast!  Great app, the best so far!
Good app, lacks bookshelf-option but otherwise very good

title: Great app
comment: I loved it

title: Fast and clean
comment: Great reader, the only feature it's missing is the ability to zoom, but if  that means faster loading times I'm happy.

title: Great. Could use more features but great
comment: Can you please add an option to always display in landscape mode? I hate auto rotate on my tab.

title: Very good reader
comment: My only complaint is its lack of pinch zooming. Other than that, it's fantastic

title: Now my comic app of choice
comment: Works great. Support for most popular formats (this is the only one i found with CBT). You should release ad-supported browser version and charge a buck for this. I would like pinch zoom, but that actually kinda got in the way with the last app I used and the pagination on this is very nice (without it) and now I just use landscape more. Thanks for the work!!

title: No real usable zoom
comment: You can't 2 finger or tap to zoom.  Mobi Reader is better.

title: Good appa
comment: Not too much good,not viewing all formates

title: Works okay.
comment: Like it because it's simple and doesn't require unnecessary permissions. A little buggy at times, tho. Crashes when browsing and some pages don't display in portrait mode.

title: Zoom
comment: Like it because of its simplicity but you've got to make an easier way to zoom

title: Will Not Work
comment: Can not load my cbz or cbs comics.

title: Very simple
comment: And user friendly. And no ads. And fullscreen.

title: Nhu shit
comment: Shit

title: Missing a key feature
comment: No manual zoom whatsoever.... useless on my cell phone.

title: Worked perfectly for a few days
comment: Now the screen goes black whenever I turn to landscape. Now a two page spread in a comic is unreadable with this app. So disappointed :(
Thanks for reporting ! Are you sure it's related to the last update ? If yes, you can download the previous version from http://android-comicsreader.googlecode.com/files/comicsreader-1.1.612.apk

title: Works with Google Drive
comment: So far this is the only comic book viewer I have used that works with Google Drive.  Needs volume control navigation though.

title: Great!
comment: Excellent lightweight reader -- I get my manga on my PC or through another app, then read with this one because I like it best. Dev responded quickly to report of an issue I was having and fixed it right away!
Thanks for reporting that problem, I succeeded to reproduce it and fixed it. I just uploaded a new version and it should be published within the next hours.

title: bug
comment: if folder contains .jpg file it won't open or even see comics. please fix.
Thanks again for reporting that problem. I just uploaded a new version that should fix it and it should be published within the next hours.

title: very nice!
comment: fast, simple and elegant! just wish for orientation control and zoom feature when fit to width. kudos.

title: The best
comment: Thanks for this app it works perfect

title: Pinch to zoom
comment: This app works almost flawlessly with one feature missing pinch and double tap to zoom.

title: The best free comic book reader
comment: I'd pay to remove ads, how about a donate version without ads?

title: My Best Comic Reader
comment: Fast, slim and sharp on every pixel, recommend for all. I use it with my tablet. One feature i miss and can't find on every comic reader apps and i hope you will add on next update is "continue page scrolling in vertical" like adobe reader that the next page is appeared under previous page. Another good thing is favorite or bookmarks sidebar on directories page. And Maybe for the last one change your app logo ^o^

title: Feature request: Bookshelf
comment: When I open Comics Reader, I want to see a bookshelf with thumbnails of the comics I've been reading. Please considering adding a bookshelf feature, and have this be the default screen instead of the file tree. Otherwise, great app!

title: Best comics reader...
comment: ... so far. But you need to find a better looking icon :)

title: No Zoom
comment: Can't (pinch) scale pages while reading, making this app useless.

title: Good - could be great
comment: Easy to use but missing a few options like one-touch resize to go from portrait to landscape.
So far so good, potential is there. Going from page to page is smooth and easy... too easy. Some more resistance when sliding to the page edges please
ist ok

title: GPLv3 and killer potential
comment: Works well and is FOSS, has enormous potential.  All it needs is pinch zoom for sma ller screens and it would be the best cbz app on Android. Also please add page tapping left or right of the screen to turn pages.  I t is a shame that other cbz/cbr apps are closed source bloatware. GPLv3 ensures you know what you are getting.

title: Nice,  but a suggestion
comment: All it needs now is to advance to the next book in the folder when turning the last page,  instead needing to browse to it.
